channel.title: Stranger Foods
channel.description: A catalogue of recipes Tom has made.

item.title: Spanish fish pie
item.description:
Spanish fish pie



This Spanish twist on a classic fish pie has little chunks of chorizo and a crispy potato topping with saffron butter for a comforting weekend one pot..

item.title: Lentil bolognaise with parmesan basil and pine nuts
item.description:
Lentil bolognaise with parmesan basil and pine nuts



Make this lentil bolognaise sauce in advance and simply heat and toss through pasta for an easy, quick dinner. You could even freeze the sauce in portions..

item.title: School dinner sponge cake
item.description:
School dinner sponge cake



My gluten free school dinner sponge cake recipe is perfect with a little custard and guaranteed to take you back to your school days! It's dairy free too..

item.title: Tuna nicoise salad
item.description:
Tuna nicoise salad



Nothing says "I'm on vacation" like a two-hour, three-glasses-of-rosé lunch. The key is finding a dish whose prep won’t eat into valuable dozing-off-with-a-book-in-your-lap time. Enter this salad...

item.title: Chicken in black bean sauce
item.description:
Chicken in black bean sauce



Gluten-free: make sure the stock cube, soy and black bean sauce are gluten-free..

item.title: White beans and pasta with rosemary pesto
item.description:
White beans and pasta with rosemary pesto



Tender beans cozy up with hearty pasta and fragrant pesto – a 30 minute weeknight meal!.
